Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{3: 'Lucia walks aimlessly among the city ruins.'}
{3: 'The city feels fresh after the rain, with the dust and ashes in the air washed away.'}
{3: 'Lucia has not taken her time to walk on this ravaged planet ever since she finished her Construct training and began to serve.'}
{3: 'Ravenge was calculating and strategic-minded, even amongst the commandants of the elite squads.'}
{3: "He would consider every Construct's battle power in his calculation and allocate time for their maintenance during continuous battles, maximizing efficiency while minimizing casualty."}
{3: 'Decisive, outstanding, and kind... this was how the Task Force and Gray Raven thought of Ravenge, and he certainly acted the part.'}
{3: 'On the surface, that is.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory604.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Doctor', 3: "Her frame is heavily damaged, especially her right arm. We'll have to replace it at this point. Sign here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: 'How long will it take for her to recover?'}
{2: 'Construct Doctor', 3: "Some of the custom parts require an application before they can be sent here. It'll be another week before she can be deployed again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Doctor', 3: 'Now, I know the fight is rough out there, and elite squads like yours are needed everywhere.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Doctor', 3: 'But you need to let your teammates rest and sleep. Their M.I.N.D. stability is much worse than what it was during the last inspection.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "I'll submit the request. With your support, Command Central has to consider my time-off application seriously, right?"}
{2: 'Construct Doctor', 3: 'Who knows?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The doctor looks at the gravely wounded Lucia with sympathy and shakes his head.'}

{2: 'Construct Doctor', 3: "I've said the same thing to many people many times, but most don't listen. A lot of commandants don't take M.I.N.D. stability seriously, thinking that they can just connect with the Constructs to alleviate the problem.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Construct Doctor', 3: "But it's never this simple. Injuries and exhaustion accumulate and become a time bomb in the M.I.N.D. Without proper rest, the M.I.N.D. will continuously be exhausted, and a connection can only treat it temporarily.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The doctor puts away his clipboard and gives a few more suggestions before leaving.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I can keep going, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "That's not up to you. The doctor, your teammates, and I all agree that you must rest and perform maintenance here this time."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murol', 3: "I'm sorry. If Xun and I had stopped those Corrupted...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "It wasn't your fault. Other squads were in charge of those Corrupted. We never planned for them."}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "I'll request a temporary pause on the operation to City 015. Gray Raven can take a break here."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But people still need our help there...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: 'Lucia...'}
{3: 'Ravenge speaks in his usual low and calm tone.'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "I know you wanted to help them, and I know you are more than capable. But you can't save everyone, and not everyone needs to be saved by you."}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: 'There are many other elite squads on Babylonia aside from Gray Raven. They will complete the rescue mission.'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: 'Trust your teammates. Trust Babylonia. And...'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: 'Trust my judgment the same way I trust you.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia is going to say something, but Xun and Murol stop her.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood. I will perform my maintenance as quickly as possible.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: 'Alright. You too, Murol, Xun.'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "Let me report this battle to the higher-up first. I'll also request some downtime."}
{3: 'Ravenge opens his terminal and heads outside the field hospital.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murol', 3: "It's okay, Lucia. Commandant was right. You don't have to shoulder everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: 'And... thanks.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: "I didn't expect a life of leisure when I signed up to become a Construct, but the bosses can't keep working us like this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "Alright, stop complaining. At least Gray Raven hasn't lost anyone yet. We fare much better than the other squads.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: "But I'm not complaining about Gray Raven or Commandant! It's the people from Command Central. They have no idea how hard we work!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "There's only so much Commandant is allowed to do. Gray Raven has been performing well, so the Command Central values his opinion.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "But that's as far as it goes. Commandant can't change what the top brass thinks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: 'At most, he can fight for some missions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: "Sigh. When will Commandant get promoted to the Command Central? He'll definitely change things up and make our lives better if he works there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "This isn't something one man can change. Not to mention that we'll need a replacement if Commandant gets promoted. Can you guarantee they'll be better than Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "Military Constructs like us don't get to be promoted to the Command Central. Maybe the smart ones get to join the Engineering Force or the Archaeological Team.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: 'But ask yourself, are you one of the smart ones?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: "Sigh. I don't want a new commandant... but promotion will be great for him. How conflicting...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: 'I wonder what other people will say about our utter defeat this time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: 'I knew jealous people were talking behind our backs. "Gray Raven only picks the important missions," "Gray Raven is so darn lucky..." Gray Raven this, Gray Raven that.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm so sorry. If I were a little bit faster, we wouldn't have...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xun', 3: 'You push yourself too much, Lucia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "Didn't you hear what Commandant said? You don't have to do everything. Try to trust other people more.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But Commandant also said that the sooner we defeat the Corrupted, the sooner we reclaim Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "That's not something a small elite squad like us can accomplish.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: 'Honestly, my biggest wish is to live long enough to retire and teach at the training camp.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: "The same goes for me. You aren't planning to stay on the front line, are you, Lucia?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I will fight until that day arrives or my last breath.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: 'What can I say? Seeing you like this makes me believe that day will arrive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: "I suppose Xun and I need to pull our weight as well. We can't keep asking you to take on everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: 'Stop making decisions for me! I would have said that myself.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hiro', 3: 'Said what? What did I miss?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hiro returns to the break room after being called away earlier.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Xun', 3: "You're right on time, Hiro. We're talking about destroying the Corrupted and reclaiming Earth.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: 'You skipped over a few details, man...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hiro', 3: 'Reclaiming Earth...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory383.png'}
{3: 'A few minutes ago, outside the field hospital.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hiro', 3: 'Lucia should be treated on Babylonia. Why did you request maintenance here on the surface instead?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hiro', 3: 'Because of that special Construct?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hiro lowers his voice as he says that.'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "He's the key to reclaiming Earth. We must catch him!"}
{2: 'Hiro', 3: 'Are you sure about our chances?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "I'll request reinforcement. If he's hostile toward us, we'll have to capture him by force or eliminate him."}
{2: 'Hiro', 3: 'Will the higher-ups believe us?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: 'They might not believe you since your recording device was damaged, and we have no proof.'}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "But I'll bet my reputation to try to convince them."}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "Right. This is too important. Don't let Lucia and the rest know yet."}
{3: "Seeing the hesitation on Hiro's face, Ravenge pats him on his shoulder."}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "Hiro, you're the one I trust the most, not Lucia. Didn't I send your daughter to a private hospital to get treatment?"}
{2: 'Ravenge', 3: "We're the ones who can share secrets with each other, aren't we?"}
{2: 'Hiro', 3: 'I understand...', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Ravenge needs to submit a few requests and plan for the upcoming operations, so he leaves quickly after stressing a few more times. Hiro returns to the break room, upset to find himself hiding from his teammates.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory604.jpg'}
{3: 'Even though this is not the first time he withholds something for Ravenge.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hiro? Something wrong?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hiro', 3: 'Nothing... Xun was right. We can only reclaim Earth if we destroy all the Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lucia used to think that way too. The Punishing Virus has taken too much from her.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory60.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'When she was a human, she would swing her dagger to protect Luna.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory54.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After becoming a Construct, she would sharpen her katana to take revenge on the Punishing Virus.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory13.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But she no longer has to worry about survival, and Luna has become more powerful than her.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory255.png'}
{1: '1', 3: "The humans betrayed Lucia's trust and ideals and sacrificed Luna and her. The Punishing Virus was the thing that saved them after humanity's betrayal.", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz114.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Where should she stay? Where should she go? What should she fight for?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'What will her hatred, her ideals, and her trust rest upon?'}
{3: 'Is everything she has ever done just a futile effort in this meaningless whirlpool of fate?'}
{3: 'A gunshot interrupts her thoughts.'}
{3: 'Without thinking, Lucia rushes toward the sound out of habit.'}
